sentences.sContent: On an oscilloscope, you can see an electrical current oscillate up and down.
sentences.sContent_eng: On an oscilloscope, you can see an electrical current oscillate up and down.
sentences.sCn: 在示波器上面你可以看到一股电流上下振动。

sentences.sContent: To oscillate about a selected value. Used of a machine, an instrument, or a system.
sentences.sContent_eng: To oscillate about a selected value. Used of a machine, an instrument, or a system.
sentences.sCn: 在一特定值的附近摇摆：在某一选定值周围振荡。用于机器，仪器或系统。

sentences.sContent: Through the mechanism called locally excitatory globally inhibitory existing among the visual cortical neurons neurons can oscillate in terms of visual information.
sentences.sContent_eng: Through the mechanism called locally excitatory globally inhibitory existing among the visual cortical neurons neurons can oscillate in terms of visual information.
sentences.sCn: 视觉皮层神经元之间存在的局部兴奋全局抑制机制能够使神经元根据接受到的视觉信息产生相应的振荡活动。

remMethod.val: oscill (摆动) + ate (使) → 使摆动 → 振荡

words.tran: [电子] 振荡器；摆动物；动摇的人

trans.tranOther: if an electric current oscillates, it changes direction very regularly and very frequently
